definitions.definition: The portion of a hammer containing the metal striking face (also including the claw or peen if so equipped).
Any organism with head shaped like that of a hammer:

subdefinitions.definition: Any shark of the family Sphyrnidae , which only includes the genera Sphyrna and Zygaena , with eyes set on projections from the sides of the head.
A hogsucker , a fresh-water fish of species Hypentelium nigricans , in the sucker family Catostomidae .
A hammer-headed fruit bat , a fruit bat of species Hypsignathus monstrosus , with a large blunt nozzle .
A hammerkop , a bird of species Scopus umbretta .

definitions.definition: A turn-around; a parking area constructed in a subdivision for initial access and construction.
A kind of ribozyme ; hammerhead ribozyme .

main_definition: The portion of a hammer containing the metal striking face (also including the claw or peen if so equipped).
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) Any organism with head shaped like that of a hammer:
( slang ) A stupid person, a dunce .
A turn-around; a parking area constructed in a subdivision for initial access and construction.
( biology ) A kind of ribozyme ; hammerhead ribozyme .
